text: Sinomonas albida is a Gram-positive, non-spore-forming and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Sinomonas. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Sinomonas albida at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacteria described in 2009 Category:Actinobacteria
title: Sinomonas albida
